suspicious_activity: The entire scene is highly suspicious, indicating potential poaching or illegal wildlife trade of a protected species.

recommended_actions: Initiate an immediate investigation into the cause of death and circumstances.
Identify and apprehend individuals involved in the killing or trafficking of the tiger.
Conduct forensic analysis on the carcass to gather evidence.
Increase anti-poaching patrols and enforcement efforts in the region.
